title: Sampler, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen
Technique: double running, long-armed cross, eyelet, satin, buttonhole, marking cross, cross, herringbone and back stitches, withdrawn element work with needle lace fillings
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen
Technique: double running, long-armed cross, eyelet, satin, buttonhole, marking cross, cross, herringbone and back stitches, withdrawn element work with needle lace fillings. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-59.
